tool.name: ScriptManager: Cross Correlation
tool.command:
ln -s "$input" "temp_input.bam" && samtools index "temp_input.bam" &&
java -jar $__tool_directory__/ScriptManager-v0.14-bugfix153.jar bam-statistics cross-corr
#if str($output_file_name.bool) == "Yes" : -o "$output_file_name.file_name" #end if
#if str($cpu) != "1" : -t "$cpu" #end if
#if str($correlation_strategy.bool) == "Yes" : -r -w "$correlation_strategy.window_size" -i "$correlation_strategy.iterations" #else if str($correlation_strategy.bool) == "No" : -g #end if
"temp_input.bam"

param.name: bool
param.label: Use Full Genome Correlation Method as Opposed to Random Sampling Correlation

tool.help: **What it does** Calculate optimal tag shift based on ArchTEx implementation
